prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Callaway and Willis Duplicate Letter Book, 1868-1870, Accession #11205, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia, Library, Charlottesville, VA.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This item was purchased by the University of Virginia Library on September 20, 1995, from Bookworm and Silverfish, Wytheville, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a single bound volume, 179 pages, 1868-1870, labelled "Callaway and Willis Duplicate Letter Book No. 1," a business located in Gogginsville, Franklin County, Virginia. The letters are chiefly concerned with the buying and selling of general merchandise and produce, shipped by rail to Big Lick (now Roanoke) via the Virginia and Tennessee Railroad.
